sample.title: Resize bar

text.p: A widget of particular importance in a fluid layout is the DlResizeBar. While this is useful for other cases as well, it will be most commonly used in a layout to allow the user to have more control on the size of individual panes.
Here is the first layout sample modified to include a resize bar:
A few conclusions from this example:

ul.li: A DlResizeBar is an ordinary widget and you pack it in a layout the same way you pack other widgets.
In the constructor, you need to specify what widget it applies to using the widget argument.
You can only apply a resize bar to a widget that has a determinate size. You can't for instance specify a widget that has fill: "*".
